events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I want to request a refund for it.
The customer's request mentions a refund, so the issue is categorized under Refund for further handling.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the item wasn’t as expected. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product has been opened or used?
Sure, my order number is 458392, and I haven't opened the product package yet as I wanted to confirm the refund procedure first.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund once the unopened product is returned. I will send you the return shipping label.
That sounds great, thank you! Please send me the label as soon as possible so I can arrange the return.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the item, the refund will be processed immediately.
We wanted to check in and confirm if you have returned the item and if you have any further questions regarding your refund.
Yes, I dropped off the package yesterday and I haven’t received any issues so far. Thanks for following up!
Thank you for confirming the return. Your refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Have a great day!
We have sent a brief satisfaction survey to your email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
The customer completed the survey, rating their experience as positive and noting the helpfulness and quick response.
The refund case has been archived automatically as the customer issue has been fully resolved and closed.
